column4: Hello gurus, i have a question, i m trying to install fluxbox in my ubuntu usb, i had downloaded and instaalled fluxbox, but as usb dont have logout option, how can i close gnome and run fluxbox in it??

Hello gurus, i have a question, i m trying to install fluxbox in my ubuntu usb, i had downloaded and instaalled fluxbox, but as usb dont have logout option, how can i close gnome and run fluxbox in it??
just want to know how to close gnone and get into getminal so that i can start fluxbox
GNOME ROCKS!!! Its the best Desktop ive ever seen!!!
omanza: agree but i need minimal serivce to run in my usb
omanza: i had insstalled fluxbox just dont no how to exit gone and run it on xserver
